name: Notion Dashboard - Full Personal Wiki
description: Welcome to this free Notion Dashboard/ Full Personal Wiki template that is easy-to-use and super functional. The theme is nature, thus the dashboard is jampacked with stunning nature photos.In this template you will find the following pages/databases:CalendarWeekly PlannerFinancesBrain dumpGoalsBookshelfJournalWish ListTravelThe pages are set-up for a smooth and enjoyable experience.
